name: CharacterAlignment
shortdesc: Options for aligning small characters to the largest character in the line.

property.name: ALIGN_BASELINE
property.shortdesc: Aligns small characters in a line to the large character.

property.name: ALIGN_EM_TOP
property.shortdesc: Aligns small characters in horizontal text to the top of the em box of large characters. In vertical text, aligns characters to the right of the em box.

property.name: ALIGN_EM_CENTER
property.shortdesc: Aligns small characters to the center of the em box of large characters.

property.name: ALIGN_EM_BOTTOM
property.shortdesc: Aligns small characters in horizontal text to the bottom of the em box of large characters. In vertical text, aligns characters to the left of the em box.

property.name: ALIGN_ICF_TOP
property.shortdesc: Aligns small characters in horizontal text to the top of the ICF of large characters. In vertical text, aligns characters to the right of the ICF.

property.name: ALIGN_ICF_BOTTOM
property.shortdesc: Aligns small characters in horizontal text to the bottom of the ICF of large characters. In vertical text, aligns characters to the left of the ICF.
